code: import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{CartContext}from"../contexts/CartContext";import{Card,CardMedia,CardContent,Typography,Button,Container,Box}from"@mui/material";import ShoppingCartIcon from"@mui/icons-material/ShoppingCart";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductDetails=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[product,setProduct]=useState(null);const cartContext=useContext(CartContext);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{fetch(`https://fakestoreapi.com/products/${id}`).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setProduct(data));},[id]);const handleAddToCart=()=>{if(product){cartContext===null||cartContext===void 0?void 0:cartContext.addToCart(product);navigate("/cart");}};if(!product)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{sx:{textAlign:"center",marginTop:4},children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{sx:{marginTop:4},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{sx:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"row",alignItems:"center",padding:2,maxWidth:800,margin:"auto"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{flexShrink:0},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"img",sx:{width:250,height:250,objectFit:"contain",padding:"10px",backgroundColor:"#f5f5f5"},image:product.image,alt:product.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{sx:{flexGrow:1,textAlign:"center"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body1",sx:{marginBottom:2},children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"h6",sx:{fontWeight:"bold"},children:["$",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",sx:{marginTop:2},onClick:handleAddToCart,startIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ShoppingCartIcon,{}),children:"Add to Cart"})]})]})});};export default ProductDetails;
